rules_text:
When Shrine to Freedom enters or when you cast a spell, exile up to one target card in a graveyard.
{T}, Sacrifice Shrine to Freedom: If there are four or more card types among cards exiled with Shrine to Freedom, draw a card. Then, exile each opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: [i]A shrine small enough to escape the Titans' notice.[/i]
